document.full_text: china's central bank governor zhou xiaochuan reiterated that china will make its monetary policy more flexible and targeted, amid intense speculation that the bank may increase interest rates as early as this weekend.
document.title: china c.bank governor vows to make policy more flexible
lines_and_colors: china's central bank governor zhou xiaochuan reiterated that china will make its monetary policy more flexible and targeted, amid intense speculation that the bank may increase interest rates as early as this weekend.
